<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In https://reviews.llvm.org/D154014 we added glob support and planned to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remove regex support in patterns. We temporarily support the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// behavior using regexes if &quot;#!special-case-list-v1&quot; is the first line of the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// https://discourse.llvm.org/t/use-glob-instead-of-regex-for-specialcaselists/71666</span></CodeLine>
